_begineg_tfacmd diagcollect_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Trim and Zip all files updated in the last DIAG_TIME hours as well as chmos/osw data_endeg_ newline _begineg_ from across the cluster and collect at the initiating node_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Note: This collection could be larger than required but is there as the_endeg_ newline _begineg_ simplest way to capture diagnostics if an issue has recently occurred._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd diagcollect -last 8h_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Trim and Zip all files updated in the last 8 hours as well as chmos/osw data_endeg_ newline command.description: _begindesc_List events summary and search strings in alert logs._enddesc_ newline
command.options: _beginopt_-search Search for "pattern" in DB and CRS alert logs in past <n> [h]ours or [d]ays._endopt_ newline _beginopt_ Default value of <n> is 1h_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-comp Components to analyze. Default is all._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-type Analyze messages of specified type. Default is error._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-last Analyze for specified duration before current time._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-since Same as -last. Kept for backward compatibility._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-from,-to Analyze for specified time period_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-for Analyze for specified time_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-node Specify comma separated list of host names. Default is all_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-verbose Show verbose output._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-o Write the output to <file> instead of printing on screen._endopt_ newline _beginopt_-examples tfactl analyze examples._endopt_ newline newline _beginifopt_noindentOratop Options: Below options are available when using -comp oratop_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_noindent -database <dbname> <oratop options> <logon>_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_<logon> : default will be / as sysdba. Specify a different user using_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ {username[/password][@connect_identifier] | / }_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ [AS {SYSDBA|SYSOPER}]_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ connect_identifier: host[:port]/[service_name]_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-database <dbname> Database name to run oratop_endifopt_ newline newline _beginifopt_noindent<oratop options>:_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-d : real-time (RT) wait events, section 3 (default is Cumulative)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-k : FILE#:BLOCK#, section 4 lt is (EVENT/LATCH)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-m : MODULE/ACTION, section 4 (default is USERNAME/PROGRAM)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-s : SQL mode, section 4 (default is process mode)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-c : database service mode (default is connect string)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-f : detailed format, 132 columns (default: standard, 80 columns)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-b : batch mode (default is text-based user interface)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-n : maximum number of iterations (requires number)_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-i : interval delay, requires value in seconds (default: 5s)_endifopt_ newline
command.examples: _begineg_tfacmd analyze -since 5h_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Show summary of events from alert logs, system messages in last 5 hours._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -comp os -since 1d_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Show summary of events from system messages in last 1 day._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -search "ORA-" -since 2d_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Search string ORA- in alert and system logs in past 2 days._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -search "/Starting/c" -since 2d_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Search case sensitive string "Starting" in past 2 days._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -comp osw -since 6h_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Show OSWatcher Top summary in last 6 hours._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -comp oswslabinfo -from "Feb/26/2014 05:00:01" -to "Feb/26/2014 06:00:01"_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Show OSWatcher slabinfo summary for specified time period._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -since 1h -type generic_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Analyze all generic messages in last one hour._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -comp oratop -database dbname -bn1_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Runs oratop in batch mode for database 'dbname'._endeg_ newline newline _begineg_tfacmd analyze -comp oratop -database dbname -d_endeg_ newline _begineg_ Runs oratop in interactive mode for database 'dbname' if instance is running on localnode._endeg_ newline

_beginifopt_noindentOptions:_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-since <n><h|d> Files from past 'n' days or 'n' hours_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-from <time> From time_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-to <time> To time_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-for <day> Specify a day_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-c Zip files from all nodes of the cluster_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_-o <file> Output file name_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_noindentExamples:_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_tfacmd zipfiles -since 1d -o foo -c_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ Zip all files from last 1 day across cluster_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_tfacmd zipfiles -since 6h_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ Zip all files from last 6 hours on local node_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_tfacmd zipfiles -from Mar/4/2012 -to "Mar/5/2012 21:00:00"_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ Zip all files between from and to time_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_tfacmd zipfiles -for Mar/2/2012_endifopt_ newline _beginifopt_ Zip all files for the day Mar/2/2012_endifopt_ newline
_beginifcloudopt_noindentOptions:_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-since <n><h|d> Files from past 'n' days or 'n' hours_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-from <time> From time_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-to <time> To time_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-for <day> Specify a day_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-c Zip files from all nodes of the cluster_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_-o <file> Output file name_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_noindentExamples:_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_tfacmd zipfiles -since 1d -o foo -c_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_ Zip all files from last 1 day across cluster_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_tfacmd zipfiles -since 6h_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_ Zip all files from last 6 hours on local node_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_tfacmd zipfiles -from Mar/4/2012 -to "Mar/5/2012 21:00:00"_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_ Zip all files between from and to time_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_tfacmd zipfiles -for Mar/2/2012_endifcloudopt_ newline _beginifcloudopt_ Zip all files for the day Mar/2/2012_endifcloudopt_ newline

command.description: Disable resources for Availability Score

command.description: _begindesc_TFA REST Services_enddesc_ newline
_begindesc_Run Exadata DBCheck_enddesc_ newline
_begindesc_Lists all important events in system_enddesc_ newline
command.options: _beginopt_-component [ASM|CRS] Searches all ASM or CRS events_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-database Searches all events from a particular database_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-instance Searches all events from a particular instance_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-source Searches all events from a particular alert file_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-json Outputs event information in JSON format_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-fields When provided with the -json option, the command will only return the requested fields_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-from "Mon/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss" From <time>_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-dd"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-to "Mon/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss" To <time>_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-dd"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-for "Mon/dd/yyyy" For <date>_endopt_ newline _beginopt_ or "yyyy-mm-dd"_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-last <n><h|d>_endopt_ newline newline
command.examples: _begineg_tfactl events_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl events -search ORA-0600_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl events -from "Jan/20/2017 12:00:00" -to "Jan/20/2018 12:00:00"_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl events -json -fields [ all | data_type,content,component ]_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl events -database orcl_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl events -source alert_orcl.log_endeg_ newline

command.description: _begindesc_Lists the indexed data in the system_enddesc_ newline
command.options: _beginopt_-json JSON string containing the criteria of search_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-fields The command returns the JSON output with the requested fields only_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-showdatatypes Outputs the list of all available datatypes_endopt_ newline _beginopt_-showfields Outputs the list of fields available in a datatype_endopt_ newline newline
command.examples: _begineg_tfactl search_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl search -json '{"data_type":"event"}'_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl search -json '{"data_type":"db_param"}' -fields all_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl search -json '{"data_type":"event"}' -fields data_type,content,component ]_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl search -showdatatypes_endeg_ newline _begineg_tfactl search -showfields event_endeg_ newline
